effect.short: User recovers the item it last used up.
effect.full:
User recovers the last item consumed by the user or a Pok√©mon in its position on the field.  The item must be used again before it can be recovered by this move again.  If the user is holding an item, this move fails.

Items taken or given away by covet, knock off, switcheroo, thief, or trick may not be recovered.
